name: .LVL64 File Extension
summary: Learn about .LVL64 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an LVL64 file with SM64 ROM Manager (Windows). To do so:
Open your Super Mario 64 ROM in SM64 ROM Manager.
Select Add Level/Area â†’ Import Level.
Navigate to and open your LVL64 file.
